name: Confederation of European Shipmasters' Associations
membership: shipmasters associations in Germany, France, Italy, Spain, The Netherlands, Belgium, Ireland, Slovenia, Latvia, Portugal, Bulgaria, Lithuania, Croatia, Finland
goal:
to worldwide protect the professional interests and status of European seagoing shipmasters.
to promote maritime safety and protect the maritime environment.
to inform the public in the eu about the european maritime industry and those concerning shipmasters in particular
to retain and develop the highest maritime knowledge and experience in europe
to be involved in research concerning maritime matters.
to promote the seafaring profession in eu member states
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
SAGMAS (maritime security)
Motorways of the Seas
STM Validation Project
